title: Me when I see this on the gameplay boards:
body:
"Please remove [core mechanic from champion(s)] . It can be used to do useful things like champions should be able to do."

Me: https://media.tenor.co/images/c7b75ee5c7c245d29dc0b7305ea2f338/raw

replies.body: ya, i hate auto attacks, no champion should be able to exploit this brokem mechanic!
This one time this guy right clicked to move and was able to dodge all of my skillshots. This is extremely unhealthy and should never be allowed to be in this game.
Once this guy I was playing against pressed 4 near a bush, and planted some SIGHT-granting thing so he was able to see my JG coming and prevented himself from being ganked. That is ridiculous!

You think that's ridiculous? I once had an enemy - you're not gonna believe this, like seriously, gut that shit - build items. And if that's not enough, those items actually gave him additional damage, tankyness AND utility!
YOU THINK THATS RIDICULOUS? I shit you not mind you! I have had multiple champions push the R key, and win a 1v1!
Dude, theres this minion mechanic which blocks the fkin tower damage. It makes it waaaaaaay to possible to take the tower. wtf is this bs?
